Body: I am willing to post a receipt and serial # if any one can help me unlock what what my girl friend did without losing all my customers info ( yes, I never thought of backing it up ). Boating season is starting, my company is insideoutboatworks.com, I cannot afford losing all my contacts. Any private mail or help will be appreciated and compensated, thanks.NOT A Stolen Item !! Will even send you a pic of my visa card to match the receipt, never hooked it up to any account to keep it private, guess that was dumb or ignorantWhat shows up on the screen is time and date on left top corner, a line with a small key board icon and qwerty key board, for umpteen times I have tried some resemblance of a password, only to say try again, after ten attempts it says to wait 30 seconds, and it carries on that way never asking for anything else, as I guess I have no account tied to it. I used it more like a customer Rolodex, with all contacts and customers yacht specifications, IE; engines, electronics, and systems.
Title: Locked screen on asus tf 300 t

history.Text: I am willing to post a receipt and serial # if any one can help me unlock what what my girl friend did without loosing all my customers info ( yes, I never thought of backing it up ), boating season is starting and sucks, my company is insideoutboatworks.com, cannot afford loosing all my contacts, about to file a lawsuit, rather not as she apparently is involved in one or two already and may take years which I do not have, she is probably watching so any private mail or help will be appreciated and compensated, thanksNOT A Stolen Item !! will even send you a pic of my visa card to match the receipt, never hooked it up to any account to keep it private, guess that was dumb or ignorant
